attributes.action: decriminalise all naturally occuring drugs (including cannabis and psilocybin mushrooms), removing the possibility of custodial sentences and/or fines for cultivation and personal use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Naturally occuring drugs relates to unprocessed, unsynthesised and otherwise unaltered forms of plants, fungi and minerals that can be cultivated from new or existing sources within the United Kingdom.

This petition does not address issues relating to the control and license of  cultivation, or issues relating to the co-existence of this proposal with current legislation (including drug classification) with regards to personal use, but it is expected that such matters would be discussed in parliament should a positive response to this petition be attained.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
